verses.verse: <S%H3045>Know<s%> you the <S%H6256>time<s%> when the wild <S%H3277>goats<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> bring <S%H3205>forth<s%>? or can you <S%H8104>mark<s%> when the <S%H355>deers<s%> do <S%H2342>calve<s%>?
Can you <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H3391>months<s%> that they <S%H4390>fulfill<s%>? or <S%H3045>know<s%> you the <S%H6256>time<s%> when they bring <S%H3205>forth<s%>?
They <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6398>themselves<s%>, they bring forth their young <S%H3206>ones<s%>, they cast <S%H7971>out<s%> their <S%H2256>sorrows<s%>.
Their young <S%H1121>ones<s%> are in good <S%H2492>liking<s%>, they grow <S%H7235>up<s%> with <S%H1250>corn<s%>; they go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and return not unto <S%H7725>them<s%>.
Who has sent <S%H7971>out<s%> the wild <S%H6501>donkey<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>? or who has <S%H6605>loosened<s%> the <S%H4147>bands<s%> of the wild <S%H6171>donkey<s%>?
Whose <S%H1004>house<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H6160>wilderness<s%>, and the <S%H4420>childless<s%> land his <S%H4908>dwellings<s%>.
He <S%H7832>scorns<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the <S%H7151>city<s%>, neither <S%H8085>regards<s%> he the <S%H8663>crying<s%> of the <S%H5065>driver<s%>.
The <S%H3491>range<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> is his <S%H4829>pasture<s%>, and he <S%H1875>searches<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> every green <S%H3387>thing<s%>.
Will the <S%H7214>unicorn<s%> be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3885>you<s%>, or stay by your <S%H18>crib<s%>?
Can you <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H7214>unicorn<s%> with his <S%H5688>band<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrow<s%>? or will he <S%H7702>harrow<s%> the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> after <S%H310>you<s%>?
Will you <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H3581>him<s%>, because his strength is <S%H7227>great<s%>? or will you <S%H5800>leave<s%> your labor to <S%H3018>him<s%>?
Will you <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H7725>him<s%>, that he will bring home your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and <S%H622>gather<s%> it into your <S%H1637>barn<s%>?
Gave you the <S%H7443>good<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> unto the <S%H5965>peacocks<s%>? or <S%H84>wings<s%> and <S%H2624>feathers<s%> unto the <S%H5133>ostrich<s%>?
Which <S%H5800>leaves<s%> her <S%H1000>eggs<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H2552>warms<s%> them in <S%H6083>dust<s%>,
And <S%H7911>forgets<s%> that the <S%H7272>foot<s%> may <S%H2115>crush<s%> <S%H7704>them<s%>, or that the wild <S%H2416>animal<s%> may break <S%H1758>them<s%>.
She is <S%H7188>hardened<s%> against her young <S%H1121>ones<s%>, as though they were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3018>hers<s%>: her labor is in <S%H7385>vain<s%> without <S%H6343>fear<s%>;
Because <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H5382>deprived<s%> her of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, neither has he <S%H2505>imparted<s%> to her <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
At the <S%H6256>time<s%> she lifts <S%H4754>up<s%> herself on <S%H4791>high<s%>, she <S%H7832>scorns<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%>.
Have you <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H1369>strength<s%>? have you <S%H3847>clothed<s%> his <S%H6677>neck<s%> with <S%H7483>thunder<s%>?
Can you make him <S%H7493>afraid<s%> as a <S%H697>grasshopper<s%>? the <S%H1935>glory<s%> of his <S%H5170>nostrils<s%> is <S%H367>terrible<s%>.
He <S%H2658>paws<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>, and <S%H7797>rejoices<s%> in his <S%H3581>strength<s%>: he goes <S%H3318>on<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the armed <S%H5402>men<s%>.
He <S%H7832>mocks<s%> at <S%H6343>fear<s%>, and is not <S%H2865>afraid<s%>; neither turns he <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
The <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H7439>rattles<s%> against <S%H3851>him<s%>, the glittering <S%H2595>spear<s%> and the <S%H3591>shield<s%>.
He <S%H1572>swallows<s%> the <S%H776>ground<s%> with <S%H7494>fierceness<s%> and <S%H7267>rage<s%>: neither <S%H539>believes<s%> he that it is the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>.

He <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H1767>among<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>, <S%H1889>Ha<s%>, <S%H1889>ha<s%>; and he <S%H7306>smells<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, the <S%H7482>thunder<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains<s%>, and the <S%H8643>shouting<s%>.
Does the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> <S%H82>fly<s%> by your <S%H998>wisdom<s%>, and <S%H6566>stretch<s%> her <S%H3671>wings<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south<s%>?
Does the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> mountain <S%H1361>up<s%> at your <S%H6310>command<s%>, and <S%H7311>make<s%> her <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H7311>high<s%>?
She <S%H7931>dwells<s%> and <S%H3885>stays<s%> on the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, upon the <S%H8127>crag<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and the strong <S%H4686>place<s%>.
From there she <S%H2658>seeks<s%> the <S%H400>prey<s%>, and her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>behold<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.
Her young <S%H667>ones<s%> also suck <S%H5966>up<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>: and where the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H1931>are<s%>, there is she.
